cab.content: s/s. &S HE C RE T.OPERATIONS.From. G.0,C-in-Cc, Egypt.13th April 1917.A.Mi.1799,Re your 32531 of 12th April tho plansregarding local French contingent which I have already made aro in accordance with the War Cabinet !s wishes,, GAZA which is the second largest city in Palestine is too important a place to ran risks of disseminating French influence there. My present plan for French contingent is to concentrate them somewhere in the neighbourhood of RAFA - KHANYUNIS.: -
